messages.message:
I am facing this error while processing a pdf (with images) using MSFT OCR v3
```I0506 21:19:31.675981    25 EnvVarUtility.cpp:55] Environment variable "ONEOCR_INSTALL_FAILURES_SIGNAL_HANDLER": "0".
fail: computervisionread[0]
      Controller failed to process message. SubscriptionId='' RequestId='9302d913-dbe8-4a75-b19c-27508c0e9755' Timestamp='' buildVersion='1.0.01934.0001-alpha-0d618022' hostId='deployment-ocr-msft-v3-7c65d554b6-vp9pm' serviceName='computervisionread' tags='analytics-controller-2022-04-30' Namesapce='vdi' fileSizeInBytes='2300628' processedPageIndex='0' totalPageCount='1' fileType='Jpeg' apiName='read-3-2' ocrModelName='2022-04-30' resultNameEnum='ReadResult' HostingAnalyticsException='args.ErrorMessage: GeneralServiceUnavailable, args.StackTrace:    at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.OcrResultExtensions.OcrResultExtensions.DownloadFileByPageLevel(IStorageAccessor store, ServiceMessage message, String blobName, Nullable`1 pageIndex, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
         at Microsoft.TextRecognition.Analytics.AnalyticsWorker.RetrieveObjectAsync[T](AnalyticsRequest request, String objectName, String logMessage, CallerContext context)
         at Microsoft.TextRecognition.Analytics.OcrWorker.OnRequest(AnalyticsRequest request)
         at Microsoft.TextRecognition.Analytics.AnalyticsWorker.ReceiveV2(Object message)
      [InnerException]
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.Storage.ObjectStore.FileObjectStore.Entry(KeyCollectionAttribute attribute, Boolean throwIfDoesNotExist)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.Storage.ObjectStore.FileObjectStore.OpenReadOnly(KeyCollectionAttribute attribute)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.Storage.ObjectStore.FileObjectStore.RetrieveEntryAsync(KeyCollectionAttribute attribute, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.StorageAccessor.RetrieveEntryAsync(KeyCollectionAttribute attribute, IEncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, CancellationToken cancellationToken, RequestCorrelation requestCorrelation)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.StorageAccessor.RetrieveEntryAsync(KeyCollectionAttribute attribute, IEncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, CancellationToken cancellationToken, RequestCorrelation requestCorrelation)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.OcrResultExtensions.OcrResultExtensions.<>c__DisplayClass17_0.<<DownloadFileByPageLevel>b__1>d.MoveNext()
      --- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.RetryPolicy`1.ExecuteAsync(Func`1 task)
         at Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.VDI.Common.Storage.OcrResultExtensions.OcrResultExtensions.DownloadFileByPageLevel(IStorageAccessor store, ServiceMessage message, String blobName, Nullable`1 pageIndex, CancellationToken cancellationToken)' errorCode='HostingAnalyticsException'```
Please note that I have configured app-tasks to call ocr msft container directly instead of calling cognitive services endpoint.
Any suggestions?
@Mohit can you share with the <#C0119EXLXGU|> channel?
sure, thanks for the heads up.
